sentences.en: Horace was invited to Roderick and Oliver's house.
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯被邀请到罗德里克和奥利弗的家.

sentences.en: Horace: ( worried ) No, the judge, my check is true, it is given by Roderick and Oliver!
sentences.cn: 霍勒斯: ( 焦急 ) 不, 法官大人, 我的支票是真的, 是罗德里克和奥利弗给的!

sentences.en: Judges: Roderick and Oliver Who are you? I want to see them.
sentences.cn: 法官: 罗德里克和奥利弗是谁? 我要见见他们.

sentences.en: Roderick and Oliver to the scene.
sentences.cn: 罗德里克和奥利弗到场.

sentences.en: Roderick Lewis did three odd things yesterday.
sentences.cn: 罗德里克刘易斯昨天做了三件怪事。

sentences.en: Roderick Lewis, 23, reportedly approached Officer Scott Bloom in West Haven and yelled, "I need a bag of dust."
sentences.cn: 据报道，这位名为罗德里克 路易斯的23岁男子在西天堂接近警官斯科特布鲁姆、并大喊“我要一包粉！”

sentences.en: Roderick Pritchett was due to retire soon.
sentences.cn: 罗德里克·普里切特很快就要退休了.

sentences.en: Roderick: the judge. I'm sorry. Newspaper news is false. A check is true, it is our!
sentences.cn: 罗德里克: 法官大人. 我很抱歉. 报纸上的消息是假的. 支票是真的, 是我们的!

sentences.en: We were joined by Roderick Hawkins, director of communications for the Chicago Urban League.
sentences.cn: 和我们一起去的还有芝加哥城市联盟的总监罗德里克霍金斯。
